strategy_reasoning: Using a cozy RPG 'Quest Log' metaphor perfectly fits our 'Village Patch Notes' strategy. It turns technical updates (docs, bug fixes, UI toggles) into satisfying gameplay achievements. The pixel art style aligns with our Stardew Valley/A Short Hike aesthetic, making dry dev updates feel warm and nostalgic.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art RPG quest log screen floating in a soft focus forest. The UI is wooden and retro. Title text in pixel font: 'QUESTS COMPLETE'. Three items listed with bright lime green (#ecf874) checkmarks: 'Select All Toggles', 'GSOC Guide', 'Linux Fixes'. A tiny 8-bit bee character floats next to the menu. Soft pastel gradients (mint to peach) in the background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm and nostalgic.
images.description: A retro game quest log showing the recent updates as completed tasks.

alt_text: Pixel art illustration of a retro RPG quest log with lime green checkmarks showing updates: Select All Toggles, GSOC Guide, and Linux Fixes. A tiny 8-bit bee hovers nearby against a soft pastel forest background.
